subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Mercer made 11 of 12 free-throw attempts in the final 4 minutes 10 seconds as it overcame a 6-point deficit to beat host Utah State, 70-67, and win the College Insider Tournament.
snippet: Mercer made 11 of 12 free-throw attempts in the final 4 minutes 10 seconds as it overcame a 6-point deficit to beat host Utah State, 70-67, and win the College Insider Tournament.
